name: Ariglad
headline: Knowledge base maintenance on auto-pilot
description:
Founded in Vancouver, British Columbia, Ariglad The first AI platform that integrates with support channels and release notes to auto-maintain your knowledge base. Ariglad suggests new articles, updates existing ones, detects duplicates, and merges them. Basically, it puts your knowledge base maintenance on auto-pilot.

This is led by Co-Founders Sophie and Ali. They are both completely obsessed with this problem and their customers, who have partnered with Ariglad to become immensely more efficient.

founders.name: Sophie Wyne, Founder
founders.description: Worked in a few different industries before falling for tech (such as the US Department of State, Big Pharma, etc.) and worked as a CSM in cybersecurity, primarily with Fortune 1000 CIOs.

founders.name: Ali Avci, Founder
founders.description: Computer Systems Engineer specializing in Computer Vision then went onto Mobile, Web, and enterprise applications. Developed award-winning biometric camera scanning app, then progressed to HR and healthcare software. Founded Ariglad with minimal funding, implementing enterprise-level security and privacy measures. Successfully scaled the company to $150K Annual Recurring Revenue.

# Auto-maintain your  Knowledge Base
By analyzing your support tickets, release notes, etc. Ariglad identifies where your knowledge base needs improvement and fills those gaps for you.
[Book DemoGet Started![Arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66718268e870f0739a9d08c9/66718268e870f0739a9d0953_Arrow%20\(1\).svg)](https://www.ariglad.com/</demo>)[LoginDiscover More![Arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66718268e870f0739a9d08c9/66718268e870f0739a9d0955_Button%20Arrow%20Dark.svg)](https://www.ariglad.com/<https:/ai.ariglad.com/>)
#### 30K+
Suggestions generated
#### 500K+
Support tickets analyzed
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66718268e870f0739a9d08c9/669695eb6c3a073817856141_se.png)
[![Ariglad - Auto create & update knowledge base articles | Product Hunt](https://api.producthunt.com/widgets/embed-image/v1/top-post-badge.svg?post_id=461411&theme=neutral&period=daily)](https://www.ariglad.com/<https:/www.producthunt.com/posts/ariglad-2?embed=true&utm_source=badge-top-post-badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_souce=badge-ariglad-2>)
Get 100% refunded for the first month if suggestions don't meet your expectations (but don't worry, we've never had to before :)
## Loved by many
![Arise Health logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66718268e870f0739a9d08c9/6716ccce43f2eda698aa8dc4_Untitled%20design%20\(3\)%20copy.png)![Arise Health logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66718268e870f0739a9d08c9/6721102c987bae47de6295db_Brown%20Illustrated%20Vintage%20Bicycle%20Business%20Card.png)![The Paak logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66718268e870f0739a9d08c9/670804635d952a8a8ed19ed2_5ef0afbf686f2c75e616a987_1280px-Webflow_logo.svg-1.webp)![OE logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66718268e870f0739a9d08c9/6671da5435ea92e917fcd341_Retool_logo.svg.png)![2020INC logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66718268e870f0739a9d08c9/6671da6e75c2dfeea6cbab3c_logo-at.png)
## an Accurate knowledge Base is necessary
81% of your customers check the knowledge base before submitting a ticket. By having an updated knowledge base you can reduce support tickets and calls. 
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66718268e870f0739a9d08c9/66718268e870f0739a9d0a51_Tech%20Icon.svg)
Update
Ariglad AI identifies existing knowledge gaps in articles and uses information provided in support tickets to suggest improvements
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66718268e870f0739a9d08c9/66718268e870f0739a9d0a4c_Tech%20Icon\(2\).svg)
create
Ariglad automatically creates new articles for your knowledge base when customers ask about topics that don't have existing articles.
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66718268e870f0739a9d08c9/66718268e870f0739a9d0a4b_Tech%20Icon\(1\).svg)
Merge
After identifying duplicate articles, Ariglad merges them into one so your knowledge base stays lean and easy to navigate
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66718268e870f0739a9d08c9/6721102c987bae47de6295db_Brown%20Illustrated%20Vintage%20Bicycle%20Business%20Card.png)
## "Ariglad is an amazing AI tool that integrates with our ticketing system and our knowledge base. 
It’s constantly learning from real-life interactions, which ensures that our knowledge base is always up to date with minimal human oversight."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66718268e870f0739a9d08c9/66881aa5783bb361c78cfb28_Star-rating-yellow.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66718268e870f0739a9d08c9/66881aa5783bb361c78cfb28_Star-rating-yellow.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66718268e870f0739a9d08c9/66881aa5783bb361c78cfb28_Star-rating-yellow.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66718268e870f0739a9d08c9/66881aa5783bb361c78cfb28_Star-rating-yellow.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66718268e870f0739a9d08c9/66881aa5783bb361c78cfb28_Star-rating-yellow.svg)
Nicolas Harant
Global Head of Customer Care
## Common Use Cases
Whether you have a knowledge base that needs some maintaining or don't have one at all, we have your back. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66718268e870f0739a9d08c9/66ec98514181e81b01d30537_CUC-1.png)
Huge Knowledge Base
For large knowledge bases, Ariglad keeps content up-to-date by revising and adding articles as your product evolves. It also simplifies navigation by merging duplicates, ensuring your knowledge base stays efficient and easy to manage.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66718268e870f0739a9d08c9/66ec988871f521192e75e4c5_CUC-2.png)
No Knowledge Base
Ariglad helps build a knowledge base by analyzing customer questions and organizing info from support tickets, release notes, and Slack. It adapts to your brand's voice, ensuring a clear, user-friendly resource that answers common queries.
[Book Demo](https://www.ariglad.com/</demo>)
Your company is entitled to a 100% refund of the 1st month if your expectations aren't met(but don't worry, we've never had to before)
## Stop playing catch up with your knowledge base
Clients are likely creating support tickets because yours is outdated
### We know - Knowledge bases take a lot time to keep updated
We get it, it's hard to keep all your articles up-to-date when your product and company is always changing. Ariglad puts it on auto-pilot. 
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66718268e870f0739a9d08c9/66718268e870f0739a9d0a02_Document%20Icon.svg)
Save time
Stop sorting through endless articles and data that needs updating
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66718268e870f0739a9d08c9/66718268e870f0739a9d0a00_Command%20Icon.svg)
Secure
We're SOC2 and GDPR compliant so your data is safe

## Common Use Cases
Whether you have a knowledge base that needs some maintaining or don't have one at all, we have your back. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66718268e870f0739a9d08c9/66ec98514181e81b01d30537_CUC-1.png)
Huge Knowledge Base
For large knowledge bases, Ariglad keeps content up-to-date by revising and adding articles as your product evolves. It also simplifies navigation by merging duplicates, ensuring your knowledge base stays efficient and easy to manage.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66718268e870f0739a9d08c9/66ec988871f521192e75e4c5_CUC-2.png)
No Knowledge Base
Ariglad helps build a knowledge base by analyzing customer questions and organizing info from support tickets, release notes, and Slack. It adapts to your brand's voice, ensuring a clear, user-friendly resource that answers common queries.
Book Demo⟨12⟩
Your company is entitled to a 100% refund of the 1st month if your expectations aren't met(but don't worry, we've never had to before)
## Stop playing catch up with your knowledge base
Clients are likely creating support tickets because yours is outdated
### We know - Knowledge bases take a lot time to keep updated
We get it, it's hard to keep all your articles up-to-date when your product and company is always changing. Ariglad puts it on auto-pilot. 
![Icon⟨13⟩]
Save time
Stop sorting through endless articles and data that needs updating

generated_description:
### Ariglad: A Game-Changer for Knowledge Base Management

**Company Overview**  
Founded in Vancouver, British Columbia, Ariglad is the first AI platform designed to integrate seamlessly with support channels and release notes, effectively putting your knowledge base maintenance on auto-pilot. The company is co-founded by Sophie and Ali, both of whom are passionately dedicated to solving knowledge management challenges for their clients. Notably, Ariglad is part of the Y Combinator Batch W23, further underscoring its innovative approach to technology.

**Mission**  
Ariglad’s mission is clear: *Knowledge base maintenance on auto-pilot.* The platform analyzes support tickets and release notes to identify gaps and suggest new articles, ensuring that your knowledge base remains accurate and up-to-date without taxing your team.

**Key Features**  
- **Automatic Article Suggestions:** Ariglad generates over **30,000 suggestions** for new articles based on customer inquiries, ensuring your content evolves with user needs.
- **Duplicate Detection and Merging:** The platform identifies and merges duplicate articles, allowing for a cleaner, easier-to-navigate knowledge base.
- **Comprehensive Gap Analysis:** By reviewing over **500,000 support tickets**, Ariglad pinpoints areas needing enhancement, driving continuous improvement.

**Who It Serves**  
Whether you're managing a massive knowledge base or starting from scratch, Ariglad has you covered. For large organizations, it keeps content fresh as products evolve. For those without an established system, Ariglad creates a personalized knowledge base from scratch, interpreting customer queries and existing documentation.

**Testimonials and Community Feedback**  
The feedback from clients has been overwhelmingly positive. Many users highlight how Ariglad integrates harmoniously with their systems and the minimal supervision required to keep the knowledge base updated, positioning it as a vital tool for efficiency in customer support.

**Team and Location**  
Ariglad operates with a lean team of four in the vibrant tech ecosystem of Vancouver. They are backed by Aaron Epstein as their Group Partner within the prestigious Y Combinator network, further solidifying their innovative credentials.

**Why Choose Ariglad?**
1. **Time-Saving:** Let AI do the heavy lifting in managing your knowledge base, freeing up your team to focus on more critical tasks.
2. **Security:** Ariglad's platform is built on compliance with SOC2 and GDPR standards, ensuring your data remains safe.
3. **100% Satisfaction Guarantee:** They offer a full refund for the first month if your expectations aren't met—though they haven't had to issue one yet.

**Closing Thoughts**
In the fast-paced world of customer service, keeping your knowledge base current is non-negotiable. Ariglad not only automates this process but does so with accuracy and finesse, making it an invaluable partner for businesses aiming to enhance operational efficiency.

To learn more or schedule a demo, visit [Ariglad's website](https://www.ariglad.com).
